alert.note: Alert for Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:08PM CDT until June 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rock County in north central Nebraska... Brown County in north central Nebraska... Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 707 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Millboro to near Ainsworth to 8 miles northeast of Elsmere, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Springview, Long Pine, Newport, Burton, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Mariaville, Antelope Peak, Mills, Brocksburg, Nets Peak, Sybrant and Meadville. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 159 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 235 and 273. Highway 12 between mile markers 34 and 85. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
